title: Element 3 Quiz - Obtain Client Feedback
description: Test your understanding of gathering and using client feedback effectively.

questions.text: What is the main purpose of obtaining client feedback?

answers.text: To identify areas for improvement and enhance service quality
To prove the client was wrong

questions.text: Feedback questions should be specific, ___, relevant, and brief.
Which feedback method allows for the MOST personal interaction and clarifying questions?
When analyzing feedback, you should look for ___ themes rather than focusing on individual complaints.
After implementing changes based on client feedback, what should you do?

answers.text: Move on to the next client
Let clients know you've taken action on their feedback
Wait for clients to notice the changes

questions.text: Design a brief feedback form (3-5 questions) that you would use after providing technical support to a client. Explain why you chose each question. (5-6 sentences)
